name: The Floor is Lava!
description: Gather your couch cushions, blankets and pillows, and try not to burn up alive.
alt: Old-timey Spiderman sitting on a livingroom ceiling fan, that says the floor is lava

name: Painted Rocks
description: You've got rocks, you've got paint, why not put them together?

name: GIF FIT
description: Shameless plug alert! Try my circuit-style fitness app to get a challenging, fun and convenient workout in!

name: Take a Hike!
description: Use AllTrails to find a great hike near you!
alt: A couple hiking over a beautiful mountain ridge

name: Adopt a Pet!
description: Really bored? And often? Help rescue a pet in need of a good home! You won't be bored, we promise!
alt: Young puppy and kitten sitting in a field, looking incredibly adorable

name: Homemade Pizza Night
description: Looking for a fun meal to make with your family, friends or just yourself? Pizza can do anything!

name: Best Ever Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: The New York Times says this is the best chocolate chip cookie recipe on the planet. How can you NOT try and make these??
alt: New York Times best chocolate chip cookies stacked on a plate

name: Scavenger Hunt - Kids
description: Your kids driving you nuts? Entertain them with these awesome scavenger hunt ideas. There's like 20 listed here!
alt: Around the house scavenger hunt list with about 40 items to check off

name: Scavenger Hunt - Couples
description: Tired of spending date nights on the couch watching Netflix? Check out this awesome scavenger hunt and other date night ideas from The Dating Divas. They include a free PDF to get started with!
alt: The Dating Divas collection of date night scavenger hunt included activities

name: Go For a Run!
description: Everyone knows running is good for you. But it can get kind of boring. Try these different running workouts with both beginner and advanced samples.

name: Yoga with Adriene
description: Yoga is a great way to challenge both your body and mind, or simply unwind. The Yoga with Adriene YouTube channel offers hours of free Yoga workouts, covering most needs.
alt: Adriene holding a yoga strecthing pose
